Lyrion Music Server.description:
LMS (formerly known as Logitech Media Server, Squeezebox, SlimServer, etc.). Latest stable version. For future updates after install: click 'i' icon for instructions .

Based on the official OCI image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.
Lyrion Music Server.more_info:
Update to newer version

The web UI can be accessed manually at http://rockstor-ip:9000

After first installation: to update to a newer stable version, uninstall & reinstall the Rock-on. Don't use the update option within the LMS!

The LMS configuration files will remain in place on the volumes that were specified during this uninstall/reinstall.

3483.description: Control channel for LMS (display, IR, etc.), TCP and UDP (SB --> Slimserver discovery and for older SLIMP3 players).
3483.label: Control Channel [e.g. 3483]

9090.description: Command Line Interface (used for example by Android app Squeezer).
9090.label: CLI port [must be 9090]

/music.description: Share for LMS content, i.e. your media. You can also assign other media Shares on the system after installation.
/music.label: Media [e.g. lms-music]

/playlist.description: Share for LMS Playlists. You can also assign other media Shares on the system after installation.
/playlist.label: Playlist [e.g. lms-playlist]

PGID.description: Enter a valid Group ID (GID) to use along with the above UID. It(or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID

PUID.description: Enter a valid User ID (UID) to run Lyrion Media Server with. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PUID.label: UID
